title: Screw You, GameStop! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.20.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about GameStop's ghoulish decision to leave its stores open as “essential retail,” and then watch them walk it back at the end of the show. 

Time Stamps - 
00:04:50 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Community Social Distancing Smash Tournament IS HAPPENING this Saturday! Go to twitter.com/kindaNYC and check their pinned tweet for the sign up link!
We were supposed to host the Core Reveal Party this week on Kinda Funny, but working from home means that can’t happen. We will do a big stream where we play Core with you and build multiplayer games, but that isn’t happening this week. Instead, support Core! They’re in alpha and you can sign up to create your own multiplayer games and play them instantly with the world! Go to CoreGames.com for get in the alpha, get creating, and get ready for our stream. Plus, you can catch the team streaming on twitch.tv/corelive.
There will be another Gamescast Review Monday morning!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Drew Gardiner, Black Jack, The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan
The Roper Report   -
00:07:35 - FUCK GAMESTOP, Jason @ Kotaku
00:25:00 - Overwatch’s Echo is Last New Hero until Overwatch 2, James O’Connor @ GameSpot
00:33:27 - COD MW2 Remastered Seems Confirmed, Joe Skrebbels @ IGN
00:35:32 - New GDC Dates
00:42:50 - Out today
00:57:30 - BREAKING NEWS: Gamestop closing California
00:59:05 -
00:59:55 -  HIMS
01:01:25 -  MANSCAPED
01:05:00 - Squad Up: Josh(Nintendo Switch) - SW-1748-6748-7476
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing and Tim
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Gary Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Ben Hanson from MinnMax
FRIDAY: Greg and Blessing
